mainTask: Write an article on benefits of meditation

agents.agentName: Agent for Research the benefits of meditation (stress reduction, improved focus, emotional regulation, etc.)
agents.taskAssigned: Research the benefits of meditation (stress reduction, improved focus, emotional regulation, etc.)

agents.agentName: Agent for Research different types of meditation techniques (mindfulness, transcendental, etc.)
agents.taskAssigned: Research different types of meditation techniques (mindfulness, transcendental, etc.)

agents.agentName: Agent for Create an outline for the article (introduction, types of meditation, benefits, how to start, conclusion)
agents.taskAssigned: Create an outline for the article (introduction, types of meditation, benefits, how to start, conclusion)

agents.agentName: Agent for Write the introduction to the article
agents.taskAssigned: Write the introduction to the article

agents.agentName: Agent for Write the body paragraphs detailing different types of meditation and their benefits
agents.taskAssigned: Write the body paragraphs detailing different types of meditation and their benefits

agents.agentName: Agent for Write a section on how to start meditating (finding a quiet space, setting intentions, etc.)
agents.taskAssigned: Write a section on how to start meditating (finding a quiet space, setting intentions, etc.)

agents.agentName: Agent for Write the conclusion summarizing the benefits and encouraging readers to try meditation
agents.taskAssigned: Write the conclusion summarizing the benefits and encouraging readers to try meditation

agents.agentName: Agent for Edit and proofread the article for grammar, clarity, and flow
agents.taskAssigned: Edit and proofread the article for grammar, clarity, and flow

agents.agentName: Agent for Find relevant images or illustrations to include in the article (optional)
agents.taskAssigned: Find relevant images or illustrations to include in the article (optional)

agents.agentName: Agent for Format the article for publication (add headings, subheadings, images)
agents.taskAssigned: Format the article for publication (add headings, subheadings, images)
